modName: John The lizard and orsimer the wizard
summary: This is a new mod and its successful , so basically ive added a new follower to this as the title says its john the lizard.
descriptionHtml:
This is a new follower mod the followers name is John The Lizard. I surly hope people like this mod it took me a half an hour to figure out how to make a overpowered follower. So here he is!

Location: He can be found in breezehome so make sure you buy breezehome in the first part of the game in order to get him then go inside breezehome and its a lizard dressed up in a blades outfit.

What level: The follower is currently level 81 and has 930 health and 173 damage or something like that he also will or has a bound weapon he has the spell wall of flames and a shout fireball 03 from the mod third era spells.

Work in progress: yes this mod is a work in progress i am gonna create different versions of this guy later on but for now just a bound battleaxe warrior

V2 adds a wizard guy which basicclly is overpowered and has 5800 health 5200 mana and something like that also he has a shout called dragon firebreath 03. New updates will come soon
v2 is also a work in progress and is progressing further everyday when ever i can i will get on creation kit and edit him 


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9U4DnuMEtJ4
author: lfuke3455tttt
